changed_products.title: 5W SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Please note that there is an approximate delivery time of 3 days on this item if it is not in stock.

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

  
 * 5W/m 
 * COB Dotless 
 * 24V 
 * IP20 / IP65 
 * 480 LED per meter 
 * 8mm PCB (IP20) / 10mm PCB (IP65) 
 * 5m / 10m 
 * Cutpoint every 50mm 
 * CRI>90 
 * 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K  All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 5 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Handle with Care during LED Strip Installation. Exercise caution and gentle handling during the installation of the LED strip to prevent damage. Please note that the product warranty may be void if the strip is physically bent or damage during installation.

 Terms & Conditions:
IP20 COB Strip Installation Caution: All strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP20, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements. Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

Uno Lighting, the seller, cannot provide information about electrical installation or electrical requirements for any lighting or electrical products.
Buyers are strongly advised to consult a qualified professional before contacting the seller regarding project requirements and seeking technical information about installation and maintenance.
By proceeding with a purchase, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

changed_products.title: 5W Garden Outdoor LED Spike Lights IP65 with 1.5 Meters Cable 4000K Cool White
15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery Time - If this item is in stock delivery is 3 - 5 working days

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

changed_products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 2700K Very Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

changed_products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 6500K Day Light / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 4000K Cool White / Yes - IP65 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

description:
Please note that there is an approximate delivery time of 3 days on this item if it is not in stock.

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

  
 * 5W/m 
 * COB Dotless 
 * 24V 
 * IP20 / IP65 
 * 480 LED per meter 
 * 8mm PCB (IP20) / 10mm PCB (IP65) 
 * 5m / 10m 
 * Cutpoint every 50mm 
 * CRI>90 
 * 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K  All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 5 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Handle with Care during LED Strip Installation. Exercise caution and gentle handling during the installation of the LED strip to prevent damage. Please note that the product warranty may be void if the strip is physically bent or damage during installation.

 Terms & Conditions:
IP20 COB Strip Installation Caution: All strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP20, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements. Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

description:

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 4000K Cool White / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

changed_products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 4000K Cool White / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

changed_products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 5 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Handle with Care during LED Strip Installation. Exercise caution and gentle handling during the installation of the LED strip to prevent damage. Please note that the product warranty may be void if the strip is physically bent or damage during installation.

 Terms & Conditions:
IP20 COB Strip Installation Caution: All strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP20, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

description:
Please note that there is an approximate delivery time of 3 days on this item if it is not in stock.

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

  
 * 10W/m 
 * COB Dotless 
 * 24V 
 * IP20 / IP65 
 * 528 LED per meter 
 * 8mm PCB (IP20) / 10mm PCB (IP65) 
 * 5m / 10m 
 * CUT ANYWHERE 
 * CRI>90 
 * 3000K / 4000K / 6500K  All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 5 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Handle with Care during LED Strip Installation. Exercise caution and gentle handling during the installation of the LED strip to prevent damage. Please note that the product warranty may be void if the strip is physically bent or damage during installation.

 Terms & Conditions:
IP20 COB Strip Installation Caution: All strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP20, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

changed_products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 2700K Very Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

description_changes.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

description_changes.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 2700K Very Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

 2 Years Warranty.

description_changes.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 6500K Day Light / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

 Please note: Delivery Time - If this item is in stock delivery is 3 - 5 working days

description_changes.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

description_changes.title: Connectors for 5W SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP / 10W CUT ANYWHERE SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP Strip-to-Strip Connector - Uno Lighting

description:
Please note that there is an approximate delivery time of 3 days on this item if it is not in stock.

 These connectors are designed exclusively for use with the 5W SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP and 10W CUT ANYWHERE SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP . Please note: they are not compatible with other LED strips.

 Available Connector Options:

  
 *  Strip-to-Strip Connector: For joining two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP20).

  
 *  Strip-to-Wire Connector: With 150mm tails, suitable for 8mm wide PCB COB strip (IP20).

  
 *  L Shape Strip to Strip Connector: For joining 90 degree corner for two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP20). 
 *  Strip-to-Strip Connector with 150mm cable between: For joining various corners for two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP20). 
 *  IP rated Strip-to-Strip Connector: For joining two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP67). 
 *  IP rated Strip-to-Wire Connector: With 150mm tails, suitable for 8mm wide PCB COB strip (IP67).

description_changes.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

This strip is rated at IP20, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

 These connectors are designed exclusively for use with the 5W SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP and 10W CUT ANYWHERE SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP . Please note: they are not compatible with other LED strips.

 Available Connector Options:

  
 *  Strip-to-Strip Connector: For joining two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP20).

  
 *  Strip-to-Wire Connector: With 150mm tails, suitable for 8mm wide PCB COB strip (IP20).

  
 *  L Shape Strip to Strip Connector: For joining 90 degree corner for two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP20). 
 *  Strip-to-Strip Connector with 150mm cable between: For joining various corners for two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP20). 
 *  IP rated Strip-to-Strip Connector: For joining two 8mm wide PCB COB strips (IP67). 
 *  IP rated Strip-to-Wire Connector: With 150mm tails, suitable for 8mm wide PCB COB strip (IP67).

Please note: Delivery Time - If this item is in stock delivery is 3 - 5 working days

description_changes.title: 10W "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 4000K Cool White / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Please note that there is an approximate delivery time of 3 days on this item if it is not in stock.

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

  
 * 10W/m 
 * COB Dotless 
 * 24V 
 * IP20 / IP65 
 * 528 LED per meter 
 * 8mm PCB (IP20) / 10mm PCB (IP65) 
 * 5m / 10m 
 * CUT ANYWHERE 
 * CRI>90 
 * 3000K / 4000K / 6500K  All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 5 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Handle with Care during LED Strip Installation. Exercise caution and gentle handling during the installation of the LED strip to prevent damage. Please note that the product warranty may be void if the strip is physically bent or damage during installation.

 Terms & Conditions:
IP20 COB Strip Installation Caution: All strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP20, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements. Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

Buyers are strongly advised to consult a qualified professional before contacting the seller regarding project requirements and seeking technical information about installation and maintenance.
By proceeding with a purchase, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

description_changes.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 2700K Very Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting

description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.
